posts.post_text: March 15, 2019 at 4:09 AM#2I'm sure there's a crazy complicated way of making that happen, but you're probably better off (I'm thinking the simplest way possible) assigning a number of sequence pool slots to each of your guys, and they only use sequences in their allotted slots:Sequence 1 thru 20 are for globals and house cuesSequence 21 thru 120 are for LD #1 (you)121 thru 220 for LD #2221 thru 320 for LD #3ad so on.
